meanings.definition: The act of making a formal request or plea.
meanings.sent1: The petitioning for better school lunches was successful.
meanings.sent2: I saw a lot of petitioning happening at the town hall meeting.
meanings.sent3: The petitioning for more recess time made the principal smile.
meanings.sent4: Her constant petitioning for a new playground was finally heard.
meanings.sent5: The passionate petitioning for animal rights touched many hearts.

meanings.definition: To formally request or appeal for something.
meanings.sent1: She is petitioning the city council for a new park.
meanings.sent2: We will be petitioning the government for change.
meanings.sent3: He kept petitioning for extra dessert after dinner.
meanings.sent4: The students are petitioning for longer lunch breaks.
meanings.sent5: The workers are petitioning for fair wages and benefits.
